thread.title: Man-Cave | Watch: Peak nostalgia as Stone Cold Steve Austin turns up on Monday Night Raw
thread.title_full: Man-Cave | Watch: Peak nostalgia as Stone Cold Steve Austin turns up on Monday Night Raw - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Man-Cave | Watch: Peak nostalgia as Stone Cold Steve Austin turns up on Monday Night Raw
text:
Everyone's excited about a new Star Wars film. Denim is back in a big way. Stone Cold Steve Austin's on Monday Night Raw. Did we all time-warp to the late '90s and not realise it?
The Texas Rattlesnake made his first appearance on WWE in over four years when Monday Night Raw broadcasted from Dallas, Texas. Austin, who's now 51, looked as vital and angry as ever when he took to the ring.
Austin was on to promote his upcoming podcast with Brock Lesnar and introduced The Undertaker before the show kicked off.
Sadly, there was a total of zero Stunners performed and zero beers drank during his brief time in the ring. Shame, really.
Take a look and reminisce.
He's still got it, hasn't he? WHAT.
Via YouTube
